ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 411
ygData.msgSnippet: When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the week to play: When ever GF dont demand attention! Time of day: 18-24 CET weekdays and whole
ygData.messageBody:
When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play: When ever GF dont demand attention!

Time of day: 18-24 CET weekdays and whole day during weekends

Longest stretch of continuous play: 12-14, dont count em.

Way to have game sounds: Full and medium

Distance to sit from display: 40cm or so 17" screen

TV show to have on: Whatever

Music to listen to: Depends.. Everything from Rancid, Marilyn Manson, Rammstein
to REM, Jewel and Sheryl Crow

Beverage (non-alcoholic): Coca-Cola or water

Beverage (alcoholic): Dont drink and play, but: Carlsberg, Double Diamond (at
the pub) or a nice Single malt whiskey (Scotish) *BG*

Health Food: Pasta or salad

Junk Food: Pizza, fries or kebab mix.

Musiker Silverdrum, Betox
